title:
OpenMM-Python-Force: Deploying Accelerated Python Modules in Molecular
  Dynamics Simulation
abstract:
We present OpenMM-Python-Force, a plugin designed to extend OpenMM's
functionality by enabling integration of energy and force calculations from
external Python programs via a callback mechanism. During molecular dynamics
simulations, data exchange can be implemented through torch.Tensor or
numpy.ndarray, depending on the specific use case. This enhancement
significantly expands OpenMM's capabilities, facilitating seamless integration
of accelerated Python modules within molecular dynamics simulations. This
approach represents a general solution that can be adapted to other molecular
dynamics engines beyond OpenMM. The source code is openly available at
https://github.com/bytedance/OpenMM-Python-Force.
